function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inclusion of additional sensors could lead to increased risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Unmitigated, this could result in increased transmission of contagious diseases within the population.","Mitigation":"Regular sanitation and cleaning of sensors, as well as strict hygiene practices when handling or using the sensors.","Technologies":"Antimicrobial coatings for sensors, UV-C light sanitation systems for sensor storage areas.","People":"Users of the sensors, healthcare workers, and the general population in contact with users.","Owner":"Manufacturers of the sensors, healthcare institutions, public health organizations."},{"Description":"Algorithmic decision-making process reliant on sensor data could be influenced by external factors such as travel, diet, and other health conditions, leading to inaccurate diagnostic outcomes.","Impact":"Unmitigated, this could result in misdiagnosis and inappropriate treatments for contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of the algorithms using diverse and representative datasets, as well as periodic review and adjustment of the decision-making process based on clinical outcomes.","Technologies":"Machine learning algorithms for automated calibration and validation, data analytics platforms for clinical outcome analysis.","People":"Healthcare professionals, data scientists, and individuals receiving diagnostic outcomes.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, research organizations, and regulatory bodies."}]}
